com.scg.domain

Class ConsultantTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scg.domain.ConsultantTime

  • public final class ConsultantTime
extends java.lang.Object
    A consultants time, maintains date, skill, account and hours data.
    Author:
    Russ Moul

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsultantTime

        public ConsultantTime(java.util.Date date,
              Account account,
              Skill skillType,
              int hours)
        Creates a new instance of ConsultantTime.
        Parameters:
        date - The date this instance occurred.
        account - The account to charge the hours to; either a Client or NonBillableAccount.
        skillType - The skill type.
        hours - The number of hours, which must be positive.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the hours are <=0.
